headline: Insect-Inspired Fashion: We're Buggin' Out Over These (PHOTOS)
short descr: While the notion of a bug in any shape or form would have me running for the hills as fast as my stillettoed feet could take
image_caption(s): Karen Walker "Philadelphia" Dress, $427 GET 25% OFF WITH CODE STYLELISTKW
article: While the notion of a bug in any shape or form would have me running for the hills as fast as my stillettoed feet could take me, over the past few years, I've caught myself admiring a few buggy items.A Lanvin cuff with a huge insect perched atop and scarab necklaces from Bottega Veneta had me thinking twice. So, maybe bugs aren't all that bad? I'll let you decide for yourself -- here, seven insect-inspired pieces of clothing and jewelry, plus an exclusive discount offer for Stylelist readers.Joan Smalls Covers Vogue Italia's March Issue - The Cut
